src_text: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
ref_text: Phulego e šušumeditše mmušo wa India go tšea dikgatho tše bjalo ka go romela batho ba go tanya dikolobe mafelong ao a amegilego kudu, go patlalatša digaretene tša menang le go fotela dikokwane.
hyp_text: Tšhoma e nka ya tšwane e ne e lekile le tlase, e lekile le e tšwana go ya kgauswi ka kgwebo, go ya kgatlhitša motho wa tšwane ke lefapha, le go ya khotsoa peleša.

src_text: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
ref_text: Gape o be a swaragane le go direla dinaga tše dintši tšhelete ya dipampiri yeo e thalwago, mehlala ya ga bjale ya mošomo wa gagwe e akaretša dithalwa tša Ditonakgolo godimo ga bogodimo bja tšhelete ye mfsa ya $5 le $100 tša Canada.
hyp_text: A re tšhwenyeha e kgatlhaganya go tšwego tša tsamaiso ya mokgatla, go tšwego tša tšwego tša mokgatla wa Canada, e kgolo ya go tšwego ya Mokgatla wa Pele ya $5 le $100.

src_text: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
ref_text: O begilwe e le wa megwaga ye e le go go mo bo 20. Mo go pegong, Bieber o rile "[l]e ge ke be ke sego goba gona go amana thwii le kotsi ya masetlapelo ye, dikgopolo ya ka le dithapelo tša ka di na le ba lapa la motšwasehlabelo."
hyp_text: Le ka kgotlha e ne e kgona le 20. Ka tlhokomelo, Bieber e ne e re: '[Kgantši ke ke e ne e tšwa ka leeso, le e ne e tšwa ka leeso ka lemo le lekgotlha le lekgotlha le lekgotlha.'

src_text: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
ref_text: Ke lahlegetšwe ke sesi wa ka le mogwera wa gagwe, gomme tseleng ya ka ya go ya fao go be go na le bagolofadi ba babedi godimo ga diwheelchair, batho ba ba fofa fela ebile ba ba kgorometša," Armand Versace o boletši.
hyp_text: Ke lebaka ka kgosi wa mme wa ke lebaka, le fa e thuso e e ne e neng e le e leka e two ba batlhadi ba le mokgatlho, ba tshwenyane ba le kgona ba kgona, Armand Versace a re.

src_text: The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src_text: It can be made very thin, and stuck onto other metal. It can be made so thin that it was sometimes used to decorate the hand-painted pictures in books called "illuminated manuscripts".
ref_text: E ka dirwa gore e be e sese kudu, gomme e mometšwe godimo ga tšhipi yengwe. E ka dirwa ye sesesese gore ka nako tše dingwe e be e šomišwa go kgabiša diswantšho tša go pentwa ka letsogo ka dipukung tša go bitšwa "dingwalwa tša go ngwalwa mo letlakaleng ka letsogo tša go ba le tšhipi ya gauta goba silibere".
hyp_text: E tlase e kgale e lekile, le le kgaleletso go dira ka lekgaitsa le tšwanelo. E lekile le kgale ke tšwanelo ka lekgolo, le le kgale ke le kgaleletso le le kgale go dira go tsamaisa ditlase tša mokgatlho wa batho ba kgale ba dira 'mokgatlho wa tšwanelo'.

src_text: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
ref_text: The great pyramid e hlotšwe go hlompha Pharaoh Khufu, le bontši bja di pyramid tše nnyane, mabitla, le ditempele di agilwe go hlompha basadi ba Khufu le meloko ya malapa a bona.
hyp_text: Tona e makgolokgolo e e kgolo e e tlholeleletswe ke tswa go tshwaritsa Pharaoh Khufu, le go fapanele bathong ba Khufu le batho ba bangwe ba kgosi ba bangwe.
